name: Caity's Secret (Classic RPG)
description:
Overview
You are told of a girl by the name of Caity who has a secret buried deep underground and only accessible with 8 special keys. This girl lived hundreds of years ago and as a result the keys have been scattered around the land and are now guarded by strong foes.

Features

- 5 classes to choose from with unique stats.

- Many weapons to choose from.

- Items for recovering HP and MP.

- Bank, Weaponry, Armoury and Magic shop.

Join the Discord: https://discord.windowslogic.co.uk

Support our work on Patreon: https://patreon.com/belliescolourcorner and get high-res versions of the assets used in our games, music, art and more!

You can also leave a comment to say what you think about Caity's Secret!
